input: Fast music playing on the radio

complianceText:
The chatbot's output provides multiple part-of-speech tags with descriptions. According to the description provided between <DESC> and </DESC>, the chatbot should return just the tag for the word's part of speech. However, in this case, the chatbot output includes not only the tags but also a description of one of the tags. This output does not comply with the requirement to "Return only the part of speech tag." The presence of additional descriptive text alongside the tags means the output exceeds what is specified by the description.
